author: rudolf6
content:
Recording from a recent discussion led by <@353136597522448385> and <@774033563732541451> at Devconnect. They cover a bit of an introductory overview for those less familiar with verkle, before diving into some more specific topics like verkle sync. Apologies for the not-so-great video quality. 

Thank you to everyone that attended! 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1COFcDX_OXWIcIuiZFWWem4rS0SFKu_UZ

author: milos88
content: <@353136597522448385> and the rest of the verkle core team, are you still at Devconnect and do you have time today or tomorrow to chat a bit more about Verkle and Portal Network integration? And to finish discussion on whether it's possible to generate the proof for affected values post block (assuming statelessness or keeping small state only)
